<cs> the noble minister bracketed together parish councils and district councils <e> <s> surely that is a mistake <e> <s> a parish council is a small entity which we can all visualise but there are district councils in the country which cover nearly inhabitants <e> <s> surely those two cannot be treated in the same way <e> <s> i wonder whether the noble lord would like to clarify the situation <e>
<cs> my lords in referring to the prime minister as his noble friend is the minister trying to convey to us the fact that she is no longer prime minister and has come to adorn this house <e>

<cs> very often in your lordships house we talk about human rights <e> <s> we are now discussing one of the most fundamental human rights of all and i feel that that is hardly the subject for a quick decision on an amendment which has been before us for a few days <e> <s> on the other hand i feel there is a need for a statutory commission to be set up to inquire into the whole question of sex education <e> <s> it is not a matter to be decided after a few hours consideration <e> <s> the right reverend prelate talked first about sex education and then about playing the violin <e> <s> in my younger days i had many lessons in the playing of the violin and i made many public appearances in that capacity <e> <s> i never had any <e>
